00082 std::string const Schema::EUROPA_DEBUG("Europa.log");

00084 
00085 Schema::Schema() {
00086   m_europa_debug.open(m_log->file_name("Europa.log").c_str());
00087   DebugMessage::setStream(m_europa_debug);
00088   bool found;
00089   std::string cfg_dbg = m_log->use("Debug.cfg", found);
00090   
00091   if( found ) {
00092     std::ifstream cfg(cfg_dbg.c_str());
00093     DebugMessage::readConfigFile(cfg);
00094   } else
00095     m_log->syslog("EUROPA")<<"No Debug.cfg keeping default europa debug verbosity.";
00096 }

00101 void Schema::registerComponents(Assembly const &assembly) {
00102   // EUROPA::ConstraintEngineId const &ce=assembly.constraint_engine();
00103        
00104   for(std::set<SchemaPlugin *>::const_iterator i = m_plugins.begin();
00105       m_plugins.end()!=i; ++i) 
00106     (*i)->registerComponents(assembly);
00107 }
00108 
00109 void Schema::registerPlugin(SchemaPlugin &pg) {
00110   m_plugins.insert(&pg);
00111 }
00112 
00113 void Schema::unregisterPlugin(SchemaPlugin &pg) {
00114   m_plugins.erase(&pg);
00115 }

00153 // structors 
00154 
00155 Assembly::Assembly(EuropaReactor &owner)
00156  :m_reactor(owner), m_solver(NULL) {
00157   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleConstraintEngine())->getId());
00158   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleConstraintLibrary())->getId());  
00159   addModule((new EUROPA::ModulePlanDatabase())->getId());
00160   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleRulesEngine())->getId());
00161   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleTemporalNetwork())->getId());
00162   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleSolvers())->getId());
00163   addModule((new EUROPA::ModuleNddl())->getId());
00164        
00165   // complete base class initialization
00166   doStart();
00167        
00168   // initialization europa entry points
00169   m_schema = ((EUROPA::Schema *)getComponent("Schema"))->getId();
00170   m_constraintEngine = ((EUROPA::ConstraintEngine *)getComponent("ConstraintEngine"))->getId();
00171   m_planDatabase = ((EUROPA::PlanDatabase *)getComponent("PlanDatabase"))->getId();
00172   m_rulesEngine = ((EUROPA::RulesEngine *)getComponent("RulesEngine"))->getId();
00173   
00174   // register the new propagator used during synchronization
00175   new EUROPA::DefaultPropagator(EUROPA::LabelStr("OnCommit"), m_constraintEngine);
00176        
00177   // make sure that we control when constraints are propagated
00178   m_constraintEngine->setAutoPropagation(false);
00179   
00180   // get extra features from TREX schema
00181   m_trexSchema->registerComponents(*this);
00182   
00183   EUROPA::DomainComparator::setComparator((EUROPA::Schema *)m_schema);
00184 }
00185 
00186 Assembly::~Assembly() {
00187   if( NULL!=m_solver ) {
00188     delete m_solver;
00189     m_solver = NULL; // just for being on the safe side ...
00190   }
00191   // cleanup base class
00192   doShutdown();
00193 }

00195 // observers 
00196 
00197 void Assembly::logPlan(std::ostream &out) const {
00198   EUROPA::TokenSet const all_toks = m_planDatabase->getTokens();
00199   out<<"digraph plan_"<<m_reactor.getCurrentTick()<<" {\n";
00200   out<<"  node[shape=\"box\"];\n";
00201   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=all_toks.begin();
00202       all_toks.end()!=i; ++i) {
00203     if( !ignored(*i) ) {
00204       EUROPA::eint key;
00205       if( (*i)->isMerged() ) {
00206        key = (*i)->getActiveToken()->getKey();
00207       } else {
00208        key = (*i)->getKey();
00209        out<<"  t"<<key<<"[label=\""<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString()<<"\\n"
00210           <<" start "<<(*i)->start()->lastDomain().toString()<<"\\n"
00211           <<" end "<<(*i)->end()->lastDomain().toString()<<"\\n"
00212           <<" state "<<(*i)->getState()->lastDomain().toString()<<"\"";
00213        if( ignored(*i) || in_deliberation(*i) ) 
00214          out<<" color=grey";
00215        else if( (*i)->isFact() )
00216          out<<" color=red";
00217        else if( (*i)->isActive() )
00218          out<<" color=blue";
00219        out<<"];\n";
00220       }      
00221       EUROPA::TokenId master = (*i)->master();
00222       if( master.isId() ) {
00223        if( master->isMerged() )
00224          master = master->getActiveToken();
00225        out<<"  t"<<master->getKey()<<"->t"<<key
00226           <<"[label=\""<<(*i)->getRelation().toString()<<"\"];\n";
00227       }
00228     }
00229   }
00230   out<<"}\n";
00231 }
00232 
00233 void Assembly::check_default(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) const {
00234   EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId var = default_pred(obj);
00235   std::ostringstream oss;
00236        
00237   if( var.isNoId() || !var->isSpecified() ) {
00238     oss<<"Internal timeline "<<obj->getName().toString()
00239        <<" does not specify its "<<DEFAULT_ATTR;
00240     throw EuropaException(oss.str());
00241   }
00242   EUROPA::DataTypeId type = var->getDataType();
00243   std::string short_pred = type->toString(var->getSpecifiedValue()),
00244     long_pred = obj->getType().toString()+"."+short_pred;
00245   if( !m_schema->isPredicate(long_pred.c_str()) ) {
00246     oss<<"Internal timeline "<<obj->getName().toString()
00247        <<" default predicate \""<<short_pred<<"\" does not exist";
00248     throw EuropaException(oss.str());
00249   }
00250 }
00251 
00252 EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId Assembly::attribute(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj, 
00253                                             std::string const &attr) const {
00254   std::string full_name = obj->getName().toString()+"."+attr;
00255   EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId var = obj->getVariable(full_name);
00256   if( var.isNoId() )
00257     throw EuropaException("Variable "+full_name+" does not exist.");
00258   return var;
00259 }
00260 
00261 bool Assembly::isInternal(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) const {
00262   return m_schema->isA(obj->getType(), TREX_TIMELINE)  &&
00263     m_reactor.isInternal(obj->getName().c_str());
00264 }
00265 
00266 bool Assembly::isExternal(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) const {
00267   return m_schema->isA(obj->getType(), TREX_TIMELINE)  &&
00268     m_reactor.isExternal(obj->getName().c_str());  
00269 }
00270 
00271 bool Assembly::internal(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) const {
00272   EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &dom = tok->getObject()->lastDomain();
00273   std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId> objs = dom.makeObjectList();
00274   
00275   std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId>::const_iterator o = objs.begin();
00276   
00277   for( ; objs.end()!=o; ++o) 
00278     if( !isInternal(*o) )
00279       return false;
00280   return true;
00281 }
00282 
00283 bool Assembly::external(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) const {
00284   EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &dom = tok->getObject()->lastDomain();
00285   std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId> objs = dom.makeObjectList();
00286   
00287   std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId>::const_iterator o = objs.begin();
00288   
00289   for( ; objs.end()!=o; ++o) 
00290     if( !isExternal(*o) )
00291       return false;
00292   return true;
00293 }
00294 
00295 bool Assembly::ignored(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) const {
00296   EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &dom = tok->getObject()->lastDomain();
00297   std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId> objs = dom.makeObjectList();
00298   std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId>::const_iterator o = objs.begin();
00299        
00300   for( ; objs.end()!=o; ++o)     
00301     if( !isIgnored(*o) )
00302       return false;
00303   return !objs.empty();
00304 }
00305 
00306 bool Assembly::in_deliberation(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) const {
00307   if( ignored(tok) )
00308     return false;
00309   if( tok->getState()->lastDomain().isMember(EUROPA::Token::REJECTED) )
00310     return true;
00311   if( !active() || tok->isCommitted() )
00312     return false;
00313   return m_solver->inDeliberation(tok);
00314 }
00315 
00316 bool Assembly::overlaps_now(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) const {
00317   TREX::transaction::TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00318 
00319   return tok->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur
00320   && tok->end()->lastDomain().getLowerBound()>=cur 
00321   && tok->end()->lastDomain().getLowerBound()>m_reactor.getInitialTick();
00322 }
00323 
00324 bool Assembly::in_synch_scope(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, 
00325                               EUROPA::TokenId &cand) const {
00326   return overlaps_now(tok) && !( ignored(tok) || in_deliberation(tok) )
00327   && is_unit(tok, cand);
00328 }
00329 
00330 bool Assembly::is_unit(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, EUROPA::TokenId &cand) const {
00331   if( tok->getObject()->lastDomain().isSingleton() ) {
00332     std::vector<EUROPA::TokenId> compats;
00333     size_t choices=0;
00334     
00335     m_planDatabase->getCompatibleTokens(tok, compats, UINT_MAX, true);
00336     for(std::vector<EUROPA::TokenId>::const_iterator i=compats.begin();
00337         compats.end()!=i && choices<=1; ++i)
00338       if( !in_deliberation(*i) ) {
00339         ++choices;
00340         cand = *i;
00341       }
00342     if( choices==1 && !m_planDatabase->hasOrderingChoice(tok) )
00343       return true;
00344     if( choices==0 ) {
00345       cand = EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00346       return true;
00347     }
00348   }
00349   return false;
00350 }
00351 
00352 
00353 // modifiers 
00354 
00355 bool Assembly::merge_token(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, EUROPA::TokenId const &cand) {
00356   if( invalid() || cand.isNoId() )
00357     return false;
00358   if( !( tok->isInactive() && 
00359         tok->getState()->lastDomain().isMember(EUROPA::Token::MERGED) ) )
00360     return false;
00361   tok->merge(cand);
00362   propagate();
00363   return true;
00364 }
00365 
00366 bool Assembly::insert_token(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, size_t &steps) {
00367   if( invalid() || in_deliberation(tok) )
00368     return false;
00369   if( tok->isInactive() )
00370     tok->activate();
00371   EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &objs=tok->getObject()->lastDomain();
00372   if( !objs.isSingleton() )
00373     return false;
00374   EUROPA::ObjectId obj = objs.getObject(objs.getSingletonValue());
00375   if( EUROPA::TimelineId::convertable(obj) ) {
00376     std::vector<EUROPA::OrderingChoice> choices;
00377     m_planDatabase->getOrderingChoices(tok, choices, 1);
00378     if( choices.empty() )
00379       return false;
00380     EUROPA::TokenId p = choices[0].second.first, s = choices[0].second.second;
00381     choices[0].first->constrain(p, s);
00382   }
00383   propagate();
00384   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=tok->slaves().begin();
00385       tok->slaves().end()!=i; ++i) {
00386     if( invalid() )
00387       return false;
00388     EUROPA::TokenId cand;
00389     if( in_synch_scope(*i, cand) ) {
00390       ++steps;
00391       if( !resolve(*i, cand, steps) )
00392         return false;
00393     }
00394   }
00395   return true;
00396 }
00397 
00398 bool Assembly::resolve(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, EUROPA::TokenId const &cand, size_t &steps) {
00399   if( merge_token(tok, cand) || insert_token(tok, steps) )
00400     return true;
00401   mark_invalid();
00402   return false;
00403 }
00404 
00405 bool Assembly::insert_default(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj, EUROPA::TokenId &tok, size_t &steps) {
00406   TREX::transaction::TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00407   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain now(cur, cur);
00408   EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId name = m_reactor.assembly().default_pred(obj);
00409   EUROPA::DataTypeId type = name->getDataType();
00410   std::string short_pred = type->toString(name->getSpecifiedValue()),
00411   pred_name = obj->getType().toString()+"."+short_pred;
00412   EUROPA::DbClientId cli = m_planDatabase->getClient();
00413   
00414   tok = cli->createToken(pred_name.c_str(), NULL, false);
00415   
00416   tok->activate();
00417   tok->start()->restrictBaseDomain(now);
00418   tok->getObject()->specify(obj->getKey());
00419   return insert_token(tok, steps);
00420 }
00421 
00422 
00423 
00424 void Assembly::configure_solver(std::string const &cfg) {
00425   if( NULL==m_solver ) {
00426     bool found;
00427     std::string file = m_reactor.manager().use(cfg, found);
00428     
00429     if( !found )
00430       throw ReactorException(m_reactor, "Unable to locate solver config file \""+
00431                           cfg+"\".");
00432     std::auto_ptr<EUROPA::TiXmlElement> xml(EUROPA::initXml(file.c_str()));
00433     
00434     if( NULL==xml.get() )
00435       throw ReactorException(m_reactor, "Unable to parse xml content of "+file);
00436     // Insert the DeliberationFilter 
00437     // EUROPA::TiXmlElement filter("FlawFilter");
00438     // filter.SetAttribute("component", "DeliberationFilter");
00439     // xml->InsertBeforeChild(xml->FirstChild(), filter);
00440     m_solver = new DbSolver(*this, *xml);
00441   } else 
00442     m_reactor.syslog("WARN")<<"Attempted to configure the solver more than once.";
00443 }
00444 
00445 bool Assembly::playTransaction(std::string const &nddl) {
00446   bool found;
00447   std::string config;
00448        
00449   config = m_reactor.manager().use("NDDL.cfg", found);
00450   if( !found ) {
00451     config = m_reactor.manager().use("temp_nddl_gen.cfg", found);
00452     if( !found ) 
00453       throw ReactorException(m_reactor, "Unable to locate NDDL.cfg or temp_nddl_gen.cfg");
00454               
00455     // First load the config file
00456     rapidxml::file<> cfg(config.c_str());
00457     // parse the file content
00458     rapidxml::xml_document<> cfg_xml;
00459     
00460     cfg_xml.parse<0>(cfg.data());
00461               
00462     rapidxml::xml_node<> const *xml_root = cfg_xml.first_node();
00463     if( NULL== xml_root )
00464       throw ReactorException(m_reactor, config+" does not appear to be in XML");
00465               
00466     // Extract include information
00467     for(rapidxml::xml_node<> const *child = xml_root->first_node("include");
00468        NULL!=child; child = child->next_sibling("include") ) {
00469       std::string path = parse_attr<std::string>(*child, "path");
00470       // replace ';' by ':'
00471       for(size_t pos=path.find(';'); pos<path.size(); pos=path.find(pos, ';'))
00472        path[pos] = ':';
00473       getLanguageInterpreter("nddl")->getEngine()->getConfig()->setProperty("nddl.includePath", path);   
00474     }
00475   }
00476   // Now add TREX_PATH to nddl include path
00477   std::ostringstream oss;
00478   oss<<'.';
00479   for(LogManager::path_iterator i=m_reactor.manager().begin(); 
00480       m_reactor.manager().end()!=i; ++i)
00481     oss<<':'<<*i;
00482   getLanguageInterpreter("nddl")->getEngine()->getConfig()->setProperty("nddl.includePath", oss.str());
00483   
00484   std::string ret;
00485   try {
00486     ret = executeScript("nddl", nddl, true);
00487   } catch(EUROPA::PSLanguageExceptionList const &le) {
00488     std::ostringstream err;
00489     err<<"Error while parsing nddl file:\n"
00490        <<le;
00491     throw ReactorException(m_reactor, err.str());
00492   } catch(Error const &error) {
00493     throw ReactorException(m_reactor, "Error while parsing nddl file: "+error.getMsg());
00494   }
00495   if( !ret.empty() ) 
00496     throw ReactorException(m_reactor, "Error returned after parsing nddl file: "+ret);
00497        
00498   // Model was loaded : check that the constraint network is still consistent
00499   return m_constraintEngine->constraintConsistent();
00500 }
00501 
00502 bool Assembly::propagate() {
00503   if( invalid() )
00504     return false;
00505   if( !m_constraintEngine->propagate() ) {
00506     m_reactor.log("")<<"Inconsistent plan.";
00507     mark_invalid();
00508   }
00509   return !invalid();
00510 }
00511 
00512 std::pair<EUROPA::ObjectId, EUROPA::TokenId> Assembly::convert(Predicate const &pred, bool fact) {
00513   // First we create the token
00514   EUROPA::DbClientId cli    = m_planDatabase->getClient();
00515   EUROPA::ObjectId timeline = cli->getObject(pred.object().str().c_str());
00516   std::string pred_name = timeline->getType().toString()+"."+pred.predicate().str();
00517   EUROPA::TokenId tok = EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00518   // if not a fact then it is rejectable
00519   bool rejectable = !fact;
00520 
00521   // Check that the predicate exists 
00522   if( m_schema->isPredicate(pred_name.c_str()) ) {
00523     tok = cli->createToken(pred_name.c_str(), NULL, rejectable, fact);
00524     if( tok.isId() ) {
00525       // restrict attributes 
00526       for(Predicate::const_iterator i=pred.begin(); pred.end()!=i; ++i) {
00527        EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId param = tok->getVariable(i->first.str());
00528        
00529        if( param.isId() ) {
00530          try {
00531            europa_restrict(param, i->second.domain());
00532          } catch(DomainExcept const &e) {
00533            m_reactor.log("WARN")<<"Failed to restrict attribute "<<i->first
00534                              <<" on token "<<pred.object()<<'.'<<pred.predicate()
00535                              <<": "<<e;
00536          }
00537        } else {
00538          m_reactor.log("WARN")<<"Unknown attribute "<<i->first<<" on token "
00539                             <<pred.object()<<'.'<<pred.predicate();
00540        }
00541       }
00542     } 
00543   } else {
00544     // the predicate is unknown : give a warning 
00545     m_reactor.log("WARN")<<"Unknown predicate "<<pred.predicate()
00546                       <<" for object "<<pred.object();
00547     if( fact ) {
00548       // If it is a fact I need to deal with it : set it to "undefined"
00549       pred_name = timeline->getType().toString()+"."+UNDEFINED_PRED;
00550       if( m_schema->isPredicate(pred_name.c_str()) ) {
00551        tok = cli->createToken(pred_name.c_str(), NULL, rejectable, fact);
00552       } else {
00553        // that should never happen !!!
00554        std::ostringstream oss;
00555        oss<<"Unable to create special \""<<UNDEFINED_PRED
00556           <<"\" predicate on object "<<timeline->getName().toString();
00557        throw EuropaException(oss.str());
00558       }
00559     }
00560   }
00561   if( tok.isId() ) {
00562     // Now restrict the object to timeline
00563     EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId 
00564     obj_var=tok->getObject();
00565     obj_var->specify(timeline->getKey());
00566   }
00567   return std::make_pair(timeline, tok);
00568 }
00569 
00570 void Assembly::mark_active() {
00571   m_state = ACTIVE;
00572   m_reactor.reset_deliberation();
00573 }
